message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $135.
I'm still interested in the product, but $135 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it.
I'm not willing to go as low as $110, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $130. This is my best price, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $125. This is my final compromise, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one final offer, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $128. This is my absolute last offer, and I won't go any lower.
I'm really sorry, but $128 is still too high for me. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle. I'd be willing to pay $90 for the product.
